t: AmazonGlobal Export Countries and Regions - Amazon Customer Service

t: Amazon International shopping and shipping made easy
s: International shipping made easy through the Amazon Global program. Amazon Global ships millions of products to over 100 countries worldwide. Simplify customs, track your purchases door-to-door and no hidden imports fees.

s: Sponsored ads on Amazon help build your brand and drive sales. Invest in long-term business growth by advertising your brand and products on Amazon.

t: Free Shipping by Amazon - Amazon Customer Service
s: Orders shipping to an eligible destination with at least the stated minimum threshold of eligible items, qualify for Free Shipping by Amazon.

t: Online Shopping site in India: Shop Online for Mobiles, Books, Watches, Shoes and More - Amazon.in
s: Amazon.in: Online Shopping India - Buy mobiles, laptops, cameras, books, watches, apparel, shoes and e-Gift Cards. Free Shipping & Cash on Delivery Available.

t: Amazon Carrier Contact Information - Amazon Customer Service
s: Need assistance with your Amazon order delivery? Find contact information for carriers Amazon works with, including UPS, USPS, FedEx, DHL Express, CEVA, OnTrac, or XPO Logistics. Visit the Amazon Customer Service official website for more detailed information.

t: Amazon Global Logistics | Ship directly to Amazon fulfillment centers
s: Simplify your ocean freight shipping with Amazon Global Logistics. Ship from your factory directly to Amazon fulfillment centers worldwide. Customs clearance and tracking included.
